name: Beetz (Alpha Version)
description:
A music/rhythm game where you play as a Bee, flying to collect the honey chips at the rhythm of original and bee-themed lo-fi songs.

If you fail to collect a honey chip, you must press Left Mouse Button to continue playing. After completing a song, the song gets faster. Try to beat your highscores!

Currently the game has 2 playable songs, more to come. First song takes a while to start (music plays but there are no honey chips to get to).
